en_US: If you’ve got Pokémon with you,
it’s safe for even a kid like you
to go off traveling alone.
I had a battle the other day, and my
Pokémon’s HP got low.
I thought we were done for.
And then, all of a sudden, my Pokémon
ate the Berry it was holding! Whew!
There’ve been problems with the
electric power lately.
Is there some trouble at the Valley
Windworks?
It’s a long way from here to Eterna
City.
You should be prepared for a long
journey.
Po-Po-Pokémon!
I want to become more like a PIKACHU!
Will you battle me?
I can make static electricity, but I’m
not very much like a Pokémon yet.
Don’t give up, me!
Become a Pokémon, me!
